name: ListAccountTransactions
description:
Retrieve transactions for a specified account.

Use this tool to list all transactions associated with a given account. Ideal for tracking financial activities related to specific accounts.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the organization whose account transactions are being queried.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the account to retrieve transactions for.

parameters.name: transaction_date_range
parameters.description: Specify a date range for searching transactions. Use 'yyyy-mm-dd' format. Supports 'date.start', 'date.end', 'date.before', and 'date.after'.

value_schema.description: Search account transactions with the given date range. Default date format is yyyy-mm-dd. Variants: date.start, date.end, date.before and date.after.

parameters.name: amount_range
parameters.description: Specify the amount range to filter account transactions. Use fields like less_than, less_equals, greater_than, and greater_equals to define the criteria.

value_schema.description: Search account transactions with given amount range. Variants: amount.less_than, amount.less_equals, amount.greater_than and amount.greater_equals.

parameters.name: filter_by_account_type
parameters.description: Filter accounts based on account type and status. Options: AccountType.All, AccountType.Active, AccountType.Inactive, AccountType.Asset, AccountType.Liability, AccountType.Equity, AccountType.Income, AccountType.Expense.

value_schema.description: Filter accounts based on its account type and status. Allowed Values: AccountType.All, AccountType.Active, AccountType.Inactive, AccountType.Asset, AccountType.Liability, AccountType.Equity, AccountType.Income and AccountType.Expense.

parameters.name: transaction_type
parameters.description: Filter transactions by type, such as 'invoice', 'expense', or 'refund'.

value_schema.description: Search transactions based on the given transaction type. Allowed Values: invoice, customer_payment, bills, vendor_payment, credit_notes, creditnote_refund, expense, card_payment, purchase_or_charges, journal, deposit, refund, transfer_fund, base_currency_adjustment, opening_balance, sales_without_invoices, expense_refund, tax_refund, receipt_from_initial_debtors, owner_contribution, interest_income, other_income, owner_drawings and payment_to_initial_creditors.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Specify the column to sort transactions. Possible values: 'account_name', 'account_type'.

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: Page number to be fetched for the transaction list. Defaults to 1 if not specified.

value_schema.description: Page number to be fetched. Default value is 1.

parameters.name: records_per_page
parameters.description: Number of records to be fetched per page. Default is 200. Specify a custom integer to override.

value_schema.description: Number of records to be fetched per page. Default value is 200.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the zoho-books API.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Search account transactions with the given date range. Default date format is yyyy-mm-dd. Variants: date.start, date.end, date.before and date.after.

value_schema.description: Search account transactions with the given date range. Default date format is yyyy-mm-dd. Variants: date.start, date.end, date.before and date.after.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Search account transactions with given amount range. Variants: amount.less_than, amount.less_equals, amount.greater_than and amount.greater_equals.

value_schema.description: Search account transactions with given amount range. Variants: amount.less_than, amount.less_equals, amount.greater_than and amount.greater_equals.

parameters.name: filter_by
parameters.description: Filter accounts based on its account type and status. Allowed Values: AccountType.All, AccountType.Active, AccountType.Inactive, AccountType.Asset, AccountType.Liability, AccountType.Equity, AccountType.Income and AccountType.Expense.

value_schema.description: Filter accounts based on its account type and status. Allowed Values: AccountType.All, AccountType.Active, AccountType.Inactive, AccountType.Asset, AccountType.Liability, AccountType.Equity, AccountType.Income and AccountType.Expense.

parameters.name: transaction_type
parameters.description: Search transactions based on the given transaction type. Allowed Values: invoice, customer_payment, bills, vendor_payment, credit_notes, creditnote_refund, expense, card_payment, purchase_or_charges, journal, deposit, refund, transfer_fund, base_currency_adjustment, opening_balance, sales_without_invoices, expense_refund, tax_refund, receipt_from_initial_debtors, owner_contribution, interest_income, other_income, owner_drawings and payment_to_initial_creditors.

value_schema.description: Search transactions based on the given transaction type. Allowed Values: invoice, customer_payment, bills, vendor_payment, credit_notes, creditnote_refund, expense, card_payment, purchase_or_charges, journal, deposit, refund, transfer_fund, base_currency_adjustment, opening_balance, sales_without_invoices, expense_refund, tax_refund, receipt_from_initial_debtors, owner_contribution, interest_income, other_income, owner_drawings and payment_to_initial_creditors.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to be fetched. Default value is 1.

value_schema.description: Page number to be fetched. Default value is 1.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of records to be fetched per page. Default value is 200.

value_schema.description: Number of records to be fetched per page. Default value is 200.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
